functionalities.@value: Must have access to infrastructure (of e.g. a Cloud Provider or private one)
Must be able to deploy (and start/stop/destroy) a Kubernetes cluster to Cloud Provider's infrastructure via IaaS offering
Must be able to manage its Kubernetes cluster(s)
Might have access to managed Kubernetes cluster of Cloud Provider
Must be able to configure CNI plugins of Kubernetes and Istio service mesh
Must be able to move data of Data Provider to given node of its Kubernetes cluster making use of Connector BB
Must support Container-as-a-Service OR Function-as-a-Service based operation
Must support privacy-aware scheduling in its Kubernetes cluster
Must support data-availability-aware scheduling in its Kubernetes cluster
Must support privacy preserving data sharing among nodes
Should provide access to an application agnostic FL platform for BB-1
Should provide FaaS (or CaaS) APIs to data processing/assurance BBs
